p: The present study has evaluated the effect of environmental conditions on the chemical composition and biological activities of the EOs of Z. majdae were collected from five localities in the south of Iran. The yields of EO ranged from 6.3% (S2) to 10.2% (S4) (V/W), calculated on the dry weight. Identified constituents of the EOs of Z. majdae are shown in Table 2.
